nodes.text: OB-CPO was the aircraft of Jock Lindsey. At some point it was kept in Mos Eisley on Tatooine.

OB-CPO's appearance in Star Wars Galactic Spy is one of the video game's several references to the Indiana Jones franchise. The name itself was a nod to Star Wars in Raiders of the Lost Ark, doubling as a reference to Obi-Wan Kenobi and C-3PO.
